description:
'''Short description:'''

These products integrate wave observations aggregated and validated from the Regional EuroGOOS consortium (Arctic-ROOS, BOOS, NOOS, IBI-ROOS, MONGOOS) and Black Sea GOOS as well as from National Data Centers (NODCs) and JCOMM global systems (OceanSITES, DBCP) and the Global telecommunication system (GTS) used by the Met Offices.

'''DOI (product) :'''  
https://doi.org/10.17882/70345
title: Global Ocean - Delayed Mode Wave product

providers.name: Copernicus Marine Service
providers.description: Copernicus Marine Service - Mercator Ocean International
